Types

DisplayID = distinct uint32
Display ID. 
DisplayMode {.bycopy, final, pure.} = object
  display_id*: DisplayID     ## Display mode.
  format*: uint32            ## Pixel format.
  w*: cint                   ## Screen width.
  h*: cint                   ## Screen height.
  pixel_density*: cfloat     ## Size to pixels scale.
  refresh_rate*: cfloat      ## Refresh rate (0 - unspecified).
  ## Driver-specific data, init. to `nil`.
Display mode. 
DisplayOrientation {.size: 4.} = enum
  ORIENTATION_UNKNOWN, ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE, ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE_FLIPPED,
  ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT, ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT_FLIPPED
Display orientation.
